title: Replace all Maui Lane logos with the user-provided image (including app icon/favicon)

requirements.text: Generate new Maui Lane Care Home logo image assets from the uploaded image "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png" and add them as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with consistent, explicit filenames for use across the app (primary logo + favicon/app-icon sizes).

quotes: change all logo with the image provided

acceptanceCriteria: New logo assets exist in frontend/public/assets/generated/ derived from "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png" at the required sizes (at minimum: 512x512 for primary logo, 32x32 for favicon, 180x180 for Apple touch icon, 192x192 for app icon).
All generated files are referenced via absolute public paths (e.g., /assets/generated/...) and load without 404s in the running app.

requirements.text: Update the centralized branding configuration so all in-app logo renders (including the sign-in screen and the authenticated app header) use the newly generated logo asset derived from "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png".

quotes: change all logo with the image provided

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/lib/brand.ts points BRAND.logo.path to the new generated 512x512 logo asset path under /assets/generated/.
The login (ProtectedGate) and header (MauiAppShell) display the new logo (no old logo visible anywhere those surfaces render).
BrandLogo fallback initials are not shown when assets are present (no image load error).

requirements.text: Set the application icon to the new Maui Lane logo derived from "MauiLaneCareHome 0-1.png" by updating the HTML head to include favicon and touch/app icon links that reference the generated assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/.

quotes: change all logo with the image provided

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes a favicon link referencing the new 32x32 logo asset under /assets/generated/.
frontend/index.html includes an apple-touch-icon link referencing the new 180x180 logo asset under /assets/generated/.
Reloading the app shows the new icon in the browser tab (favicon) after cache refresh/hard reload.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not route logo/image fetching through the backend; serve logos as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
nonGoals: No changes to backend canister logic or schemas.
No redesign of layout, colors, typography, or UI structure beyond swapping logo/icon assets.
